1:
CIRCULAR 39 / 2000 
 
 
Subject: 
Provision of vehicle to Dr. M.S.Gill, Chief Election 
Commissioner up to the aircraft. 
 
  
I am directed to convey the approval of the Government to provide Airports Authority 
of India’s vehicle to Dr. M.S. Gill, Chief Election Commissioner of India from Terminal 
Building to aircraft and vice versa during his departure / arrival at all civil airports in the 
country. 
 
 (R.K.Singh) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
NO.CAS-8(1)/99-DIV-I 
Dated : 05.12.2000
